assessment_item.subject: Microbiology
assessment_item.title: 7SMXJ1-09-யூட்ராபிகேஷன் நிலையில் ________ நடைபெறுகிறது.
assessment_item.body:
{"data":{"plugin":{"id":"org.ekstep.questionunit.mcq","version":"1.1","templateId":"horizontalMCQ"},"data":{"question":{"text":"

யூட்ராபிகேஷன் நிலையில் ________ நடைபெறுகிறது.

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":""},"options":[{"text":"

நீரில் ஆக்ஸிஜன் அளவு அதிகமாகிறது

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":"","isCorrect":false,"$$hashKey":"object:4446"},{"text":"

நீரில் ஆக்ஸிஜன் அளவு குறைகிறது

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":"","isCorrect":true,"$$hashKey":"object:4447"},{"text":"

நைட்ரஜன் அளவு குறைகிறது

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","isCorrect":false,"$$hashKey":"object:4457"},{"text":"

நைட்ரஜன் அளவு அதிகரிக்கிறது

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","isCorrect":false,"$$hashKey":"object:4462"}],"questionCount":0,"media":[]},"config":{"metadata":{"max_score":1,"isShuffleOption":true,"isPartialScore":true,"templateType":"Horizontal","name":"7SMXJ1-09-யூட்ராபிகேஷன் நிலையில் ________ நடைபெறுகிறது.","title":"7SMXJ1-09-யூட்ராபிகேஷன் நிலையில் ________ நடைபெறுகிறது.","board":"State (Tamil Nadu)","medium":"Tamil","gradeLevel":["Class 11"],"subject":"Microbiology","qlevel":"MEDIUM","contentType":"Resource","mimeType":"application/vnd.ekstep.ecml-archive","category":"MCQ"},"max_time":0,"max_score":1,"partial_scoring":true,"layout":"Horizontal","isShuffleOption":true,"questionCount":1},"media":[]}}
